H0.text: In golf, the holing of a ball directly from a bunker is known as a ‘Golden ‘what’. Eagle

H1.text: In golf, the holing of a ball directly from a bunker is known as a ‘Golden ‘what’. Shot

H2.text: In golf, the holing of a ball directly from a bunker is known as a ‘Golden ‘what’. Strike

H3.text: In golf, the holing of a ball directly from a bunker is known as a ‘Golden ‘what’. Futret

A4.text: The Golden Shot is a British television game show produced by ATV for ITV between 1 July 1967 and 13 April 1975.

A5.text: The show was revived again as a one-off on Vernon Kay's Gameshow Marathon on 28 April 2007.
